name: Blunder Bros Calamity Crew
description:
controls:

game 1: A or D, Left or RIght to move

game 2: WASD or Up, Down, Left, Right to move.

game 3: A or D, Left or Right to rotate.

game 4: button masher! A or D, Left or Right to move forward against the conveyor floor! W or Up to jump over the bananas!

for the web version (currently unplayable from webGL scene loading is incorrect) you can visit the github location here! (updates will be made in an attempt to make webplayer playable again)   https://github.com/Tranzorro/BlunderBrosCalamityCrew

please use the downloadable executables below and thank you for playing our game!
